info.+content: ラブライブ！ School idol project

With Otonokizaka Academy saved by Honoka Kōsaka and members of µ's from being shut down, students are now back to their normal campus lives—for a brief period. Members of µ's are now brought back to the stage and compete with other idol groups for regional tournaments.
#1: "Sore wa Bokutachi no Kiseki" (それは僕たちの奇跡;That Is Our Miracle) by μ's
#1: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Yoshino Nanjou, Aina Kusuda & Sora Tokui (ep 2)
#2: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by μ's (eps 3,11)
#3: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Sora Tokui (ep 4)
#4: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Riho Iida (ep 5)
#5: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Riho Iida, Pile & Yurika Kubo (ep 6)
#6: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Emi Nitta, Aya Uchida & Suzuko Mimori (ep 7)
#7: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Yoshino Nanjou, Pile & Aina Kusuda (ep 8)
#8: "Don'na toki mo zutto" (どんなときもずっと; Always No Matter What) by Emi Nitta (ep 10)
"Bokura wa Ima no Naka de" (僕らは今の中で; We Are in the Now) by μ's (ep 12)
"Door of Dreams" (ユメノトビラ; Yume no Tobira) by μ's (ep 3)
"Hurray I love you!(Piano Mix)" (愛してるばんざーい!; Aishiteru Banzai!) by μ's (ep 13)
"Kore made no Love Live! ~ Musical ver.~" (これまでのラブライブ! 〜ミュージカルver.〜) by μ's, Marie Miyake, Nozomi Yamamoto & Sayuri Hara (ep 1)
"Love Wing Bell" by Riho Iida, Pile, Yurika Kubo, Yoshino Nanjou, Aina Kusuda & Sora Tokui (ep 5)
